ExecutableTestSuite.label: csw again
ExecutableTestSuite.description: This test was generated automatically from a Schema profile in haleconnect
ExecutableTestSuite.author: admin admin

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Keywords' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'type' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • stratum
  • theme
  • discipline
  • place
TestAssertion.expression: let $codes := ('stratum', 'theme', 'discipline', 'place') let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='MD_Keywords' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $valueFound := $typeFound/*[local-name()='type' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/@codeListValue return if ($valueFound and not(data($valueFound) = $codes)) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidPropertyValueError', map { 'propName': 'type', 'localName': 'MD_Keywords', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'valueFound': $valueFound, 'allowedValues': string-join( $codes, ', ') }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
